display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (all apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal + hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with >= 3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal)  / hour of sleep
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
calculation: 60 * (hrembp3 + hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + urbp3 + urop3 + unrbp3 + unrop3 + carbp + carop + canbp + canop + oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop) / ttldursp
